description: Read vertical interval timecode and write it to frame metadata.
name: readvitc

options.description: Set the maximum number of lines to scan for VITC data. If the value is set to -1 the full video frame is scanned. Default is 45.
options.name: scan_max

options.description: Set the luma threshold for black. Accepts float numbers in the range [0.0,1.0], default value is 0.2. The value must be equal or less than thr_w.
options.name: thr_b

options.description: Set the luma threshold for white. Accepts float numbers in the range [0.0,1.0], default value is 0.6. The value must be equal or greater than thr_b.
options.name: thr_w
